title: Drawing, "International Casino: Sofa, Second Floor East Wall", June 14, 1937
medium: Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite
markings: Stamps: Architect's stamp in black ink at lower right: DONALD DESKEY/630 FIFTH AVENUE/NEW YORK CITY
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite with dimensions, instructions throughout Inscribed in graphite in architect's stamp: 546-69; 1/2"&1 1/2"-1'-0"; INT.CAS; Olsson / 6/14/37; 6/15/37 1 BRECKER / " 2 WEISS / 6/16/37 5 BRECKER / 8/11/37 1 EMPIRE / 9/9/37 1 OFFICE
description: Plan, elevation, and perspective drawing of sofa for east wall of second floor. Plan shows sofa in three parts, with arms at each end. Low, upholstered sofa on short bun feet. Six rectangular tables in front of sofa. Mirror on wall behind sofa, reflector light in trough directly behind sofa. Sofa covered red, brown, and white striped upholstery, running horizontally.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "International Casino: Sofa, Second Floor East Wall", June 14, 1937.
June 14, 1937. Graphite and black ink on tracing paper, ruled border in graphite. Gift of Donald Deskey. 1975-11-205.
